title: Virtual Choir
deck: Enjoy singing? Then why not sign up to join our virtual choir?
article:
Enjoy singing? Then why not sign up to join our virtual choir?

Everyone is welcome - all ages and singing abilities. You'll join via Zoom and enjoy singing in the comfort of your own home. Microphones will be muted, so the only person everyone can hear is our choir leader Nicola. 

The session will last approximately one hour with a break mid-way for refreshments and a chat. 

Sign up [here](https://gateway.churchsuite.co.uk/events/gbiovi3r).
